AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: magician
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Quite unexpectedly, [PAWN_nameDef] came into possession of an ancient family spellbook. After reading it, [PAWN_pronoun] learned the secrets of [PAWN_possessive] family, which [PAWN_pronoun] decided to keep secret so as not to tarnish [PAWN_possessive] name. This idea led [PAWN_possessive] to the decision to become a magician.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gemologist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] showed an interest in magic and everything related to it. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_pronoun] connected [PAWN_possessive] life with the magical properties of objects, studying crystals and various fossils.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: blackmagic caster
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] discovered the ancient book in the attic of [PAWN_possessive] house by chance. As a magician, [PAWN_pronoun] took a special interest in the forbidden spells it contained.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: magic teacher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: An accomplished spellcaster, [PAWN_nameDef] decided that [PAWN_possessive] calling was to teach magic to others. [PAWN_pronoun] began to teach those who wished to learn the art of magic.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: crystal digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After failing to succeed in [PAWN_possessive] professional life, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to leave [PAWN_possessive] home because of debts. Not knowing what to do next, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to take a job in a mine and mine crystals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: crystal jeweler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] continued the family tradition - all [PAWN_possessive] relatives were prominent jewelers in the city. [PAWN_pronoun] learned [PAWN_possessive] skills from [PAWN_possessive] father and reached unprecedented heights in jewelry making.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: crystal magnate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] father's death, [PAWN_nameDef] received a huge inheritance. [PAWN_pronoun] became the largest crystal magnate in the country and knew no worries.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: court wizard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] taught at one of the most prestigious magical schools. For [PAWN_possessive] services to the Kingdom, [PAWN_pronoun] was appointed to the honorable position of court mage.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: unicorn worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While [PAWN_nameDef]'s knowledge of magic theory left much to be desired, [PAWN_possessive] ability to telekinesis was amazingly advanced. Thanks to [PAWN_possessive] talent, [PAWN_pronoun] got a job at a spaceport, where [PAWN_pronoun] sorted various cargoes.
